posts.post_content:
Posted By: Mike Masinick
Hey guys, our collection from CardTarget.com is currently available for sale.

Here are all of the high end pre-war cards we have available and that will be sold in the next few months:

1887 Allen & Ginter Charles Comiskey (PSA 6)
1909-11 T206 Chick Gandil (Red Hindu SGC 50)
1909-11 T206 Christy Mathewson (Broadleaf 460)
1909-11 T206 Collection of 36 Backs (including BL 460, Drum, Red Hindu, Etc...)
1909-11 T206 Iron Man McGinnity (SGC 96)
1909-11 T206 Nap Lajoie Throwing (PSA 9)
1909-11 T206 Red Kleinow - Boston (Broadleaf 460)
1909-11 T206 Walter Johnson (Lenox - SGC 3)
1911 T205 Christy Mathewson (SGC 7)
1933 Goudey Sport Kings Babe Didrickson (PSA 8) (R)
1939 Play Ball Ted Williams (PSA 8) (R)
1941 Play Ball Joe DiMaggio (GAI 8.5)
1941 Play Ball Ted Williams (PSA 8)

Pictures of all cards can be viewed at:

[url]http://www.cardtarget.com/cgi-bin/ct_checklist.cgi[/url]

Then click on the individual card/lot.  Please contact us for information regarding how to make an offer on these cards and how the sales process will work.  Any unsold cards will be consigned to a major auction house, so get your bid in before the serious competition starts.  =)

staff@cardtarget.com

Thanks!

Posted By: Wesley
Do you have set prices for the cards?  Or is this a secret bidding format sale?

Posted By: Mike Masinick
Good question.  It's not really a super secret sale or anything.  However, the cards are owned by a group of people, not one individual.  And there are terms and conditions that dictate that a vote must be taken of the shareholders if the offer value is less than a certain price.  If you email me I can tell you the "buy it now" price on any card or let you know the minimum offer that we would put up for a vote.   It's a tad complicated, but I'm sure I can explain it to you...  please email me and let me know which cards/lots you're interested in and we can go from there.

Mike Masinick
CardTarget.com

Posted By: JP
I'm interested in the Lajoie PSA 9 but can't understand your website or buying process.  Can you e-mail me a bottom line on this card?

Posted By: Mike Masinick
Here are the most common price quotes I've had to make:

1909-11 T206 Chick Gandil (Red Hindu SGC 50)
Buy now $4500.  Min offer $3300.

1909-11 T206 Christy Mathewson (Broadleaf 460)
Buy now $8812, we have a current offer of $7400.

1909-11 T206 Collection of 36 Backs (including BL 460, Drum, Red Hindu, Etc...)
Buy Now:  $7417, Min offer: $6000

1909-11 T206 Red Kleinow - Boston (Broadleaf 460)
Buy Now:  $4950, Current Offer: $4320

1909-11 T206 Walter Johnson (Lenox - SGC 3)
Buy Now:  $3176, Current Offer:  $2550

Please let me know if you'd like any others or would like to know more about how making an offer would work.  Thanks guys.
